casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Victor ANDINO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 27, 2017

Daniel J. Krisch, Hartford, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Matthew A. Weiner, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 173 Conn.App. 851, 162 A.3d 736 (2017), is denied.

EVELEIGH, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
